verses.name: Luke 19:30
verses.text: Saying, Go ye into the village over against you; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied, whereon yet never man sat: loose him, and bring him hither.

verses.name: Luke 19:31
verses.text: And if any man ask you, Why do ye loose him? thus shall ye say unto him, Because the Lord hath need of him.

verses.name: Luke 19:32
verses.text: And they that were sent went their way, and found even as he had said unto them.

verses.name: Luke 19:33
verses.text: And as they were loosing the colt, the owners thereof said unto them, Why loose ye the colt?

verses.name: Luke 19:34
verses.text: And they said, The Lord hath need of him.
